title: Approve an Accessorial Charge
description: A carrier adds an accessorial charge (e.g., 'Liftgate Service') to a freight bill. A specialist must review and approve it.

tasks.description: The system flags a freight invoice because it has an accessorial charge that was not on the original rate confirmation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The invoice is put on hold for review.

tasks.description: The specialist reviews the charge and checks the POD to see if liftgate service was noted by the consignee.
tasks.expected_outcome: The specialist finds a note on the POD saying 'liftgate used'.

tasks.description: The specialist approves the accessorial charge as valid.
The invoice is released from hold and approved for payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The full invoice amount is now scheduled for payment.
